15.5. Supported Languages for Locales

Zend_Locale provides information for the following languages.

Tableau 15.5. List of all supported languages

aa Afar
af Afrikaans
am Amharic
ar Arabic
as Assamese
az Azerbaijani
be Belarusian
bg Bulgarian
bn Bengali
